alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 31 at 2:48AM PST until February 02 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM THURSDAY TO 10 AM PST FRIDAY ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 6500 feet. Total snow accumulations: Under 1 inch of snow below 6500 feet, including the city of Tonopah. 1 to 4 inches of snow between 6500 and and 7500 feet, and 6 to 16 inches of snow above 7500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Northwestern Nye County and Northeastern Nye County. * WHEN...From 4 AM Thursday to 10 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County
